articles.description: Max Verstappen puts in an awe-inspiring performance in setting the fastest time in first practice at the Japanese Grand Prix.
articles.title: Verstappen dominates first practice in Japan

articles.description: Brighton suffer defeat on their debut in European competition as they are beaten at home by AEK Athens in the Europa League.
articles.title: Brighton stunned on European debut by AEK Athens

articles.description: Rangers mark their return to the safe haven of the Europa League with a narrow but impressive victory over Real Betis.
articles.title: Sima goal gives Rangers narrow win over Real Betis

articles.description: France are on the brink of reaching the World Cup quarter-finals after claiming the biggest win of the 2023 tournament with a 96-0 victory over Namibia.
articles.title: Ruthless France crush Namibia with 14 tries

articles.description: Georgia Hall and Celine Boutier will renew their unbeaten partnership when Europe's Solheim Cup defence gets under way on Friday at Finca Cortesin, Spain.
articles.title: Hall & Boutier reunited for opening Solheim match

articles.description: Sheffield United say they are "devastated" by the death of midfielder Maddy Cusack aged 27.
articles.title: Sheff Utd 'devastated' by death of Cusack at 27

articles.description: Before Sunday’s game between Arsenal and Tottenham, BBC Sport remembers a north London derby that had it all.
articles.title: Screamers, howlers & late drama - the derby that had it all

articles.description: England captain Owen Farrell admits that is has been difficult to watch his team-mates at the Rugby World Cup while he serves out a ban for a high tackle.
articles.title: Farrell raring for World Cup bow after 'challenging' ban

articles.description: Mohammed Kudus scores his first West Ham goal as the Europa Conference League holders come from behind to beat Serbian side Backa Topola in the Europa League.
articles.title: Kudus on target as West Ham beat Backa Topola

articles.description: Aston Villa make a poor start to their first European campaign in 13 years as appalling defending allows Legia Warsaw to get the better of them in the Europa Conference League.
articles.title: Defensive errors cost Villa at Legia Warsaw
